title: Cooking Conversion Calculator: Cups, Grams, Ounces, Tablespoons

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Volume: target = source_ml × (1 / target_unit_ml) Weight: target = source_g × (1 / target_unit_g) Ingredient (vol → wt): weight_g = volume_cups × density_g_per_cup Temperature: °F = (°C × 9/5) + 32 °C = (°F − 32) × 5/9 Gas Mark is estimated from °C intervals.

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).

Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
